column4: no he isn't ( I hope), just helped me with my i945gme-prob... :-)

but perhaps you can help with my first topic: I have tried to run WoW on my netbook which uses a intel mobile 945gme and it crashes the video-output, sound is running, cpu is loaded, but there is no video, and after some seconds it gives me "severe Error #132"... :-(
which I could not find any information about on google... :-(
sorry... I don't even know what WoW is...
